full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: TBIPS - Multiple Service Categories

### General Information
* **Tender Title**: Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) - Multiple Service Categories
* **Reference Number**: cb-4830-78665163
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: 2023-04-18
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-15T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Service Description
The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is inviting bidders to provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. The required services include:

* Level 3 - A.1 Application/Software Architect for a period of 250 days
* Level 3 - A.7 Programmer/Analyst for a period of 250 days
* Level 3 - A.8 System Analyst for a period of 250 days
* Level 3 - A.11 Tester for a period of 250 days

The contract will be awarded for a period of one (1) year, with the option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods.

### Eligibility Requirements
Only TBIPS SA Holders currently holding a TBIPS SA, in all required resource categories in this solicitation and in the National Capital Region, are eligible to compete.

### Security Requirement
The project requires a minimum of Designated Organization Screening (DOS) for corporate security and a minimum of Reliability for resource security.

### Tender Documents
More information can be found in the tender description. The solicitation document is available in English and French. [/English]

### Contact Information
* **Name**: DANIEL MICHAUD
* **Email**: daniel.michaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 16138588483

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on
